column1: The Pit Room////Got the 2 plate dinner (Sausage/Chicken) on a cold Saturday night
column2: unfortunately they were out of the popular meats (no brisket/ribs).  But overall enjoyed the atmosphere and the service.  Chicken was very flavorful and smoked very well
column3: the green beans side were a little over seasoned.    Good selection of condiments available (jalapeños
